meanings.sent1: My friend is a big snacker and always has snacks in their bag.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy hanging out with my friends who are fellow snackers.
meanings.sent3: The snacker in our group is always the first one to suggest a snack break.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the ultimate snacker, never seen without a snack in hand.
meanings.sent5: The snacker's love for snacks was unmatched, always trying new and exotic snacks.

meanings.sent1: I like to have some crackers as a quick snacker before dinner.
meanings.sent2: For a light lunch, I usually opt for a salad or some other healthy snacker.
meanings.sent3: The tiny snacker she brought to the picnic was a hit among the group.
meanings.sent4: The snacker of a sandwich she made was so delicious, it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The snacker of a cupcake she baked was a delightful treat for everyone at the party.
